thread.title_full: 2017 KTM 390 Duke launched in India at Rs 2.25 lakh : New Launches, News - India Today

title: 2017 KTM 390 Duke launched in India at Rs 2.25 lakh : New Launches, News - India Today
text:
2017 KTM 390 Duke launched in India at Rs 2.25 lakh IndiaToday.in | New Delhi, February 23, 2017 | Written by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 12:48 IST 
KTM on Thursday finally launched the much-awaited 390 Duke in India at Rs 2.25 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi). KTM had unveiled the new generation 390 Duke at the EICMA 2016 and the entire KTM range is manufactured at Bajaj Auto's Chakan plant in Pune. The deliveries of the 2017 KTM 390 Duke will commence from March. 
Engine: 
The 2017 KTM Duke 390 will come with a 373.2cc, 1-cylinder, 4-stroke Liquid cooled engine that churns out peak power at 42HP and peak torque of 37 Nm, mated to a six-speed transmission. The engine will be BS-IV compliant. 2017 KTM 390 Duke 
Design: 
First-off, the new 390 Duke takes design cues from the KTM 1290 Super Duke and comes with a new bolt-on rear subframe, a larger steel tank and steeply rising lines that catapult their street cred sky-high. The 2017 Duke 390 also receives a high-tech TFT display, an LED headlight and the best brakes in their segment. 
Features: 
The new KTM Duke 390 will come loaded with features like LED DRL, LED headlight, LED taillight, Colour TFT instrument panel and KTM MY RIDE for smartphone tethering. 2017 KTM 390 Duke 
Dimensions: 
The new KTM 390 Duke will come with a wheelbase of 1367 mm and measures 2145 mm in length, 760 mm in width, 800 mm in length and a ground clearance of 170 mm. 
Fuel Efficiency: 
The 2017 KTM 390 Duke will give a fuel efficiency of 35 Kmpl from its 13.5-litre fuel tank and an overall ride range of 385 km. 2017 KTM 390 Duke 
Competition: 
The new 390 Duke will compete against the likes of DSK Benelli TNT 25, Mahindra Mojo, Honda CBR 250R and Bajaj Dominar 400 in India. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
